Package dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.roborally.view

Class GameDialogs

java.lang.Object
dk.dtu.compute.se.pisd.roborally.view.GameDialogs
public class GameDialogs extends Object
This class contains methods for showing dialogs to the user. The dialogs are used to get input from the user. The methods are static and can be called from anywhere in the code.
Author:
Marcus s214962
